attributes.action: stop the unfair increase in fuel duty as stated in the pre budget report on 24th November
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everybody who drives a car only does so because the public transport in this country is a joke.  The reduced VAT rate as announced gave the motorist a glimmer of hope.  Alastair Darling then announced an increase of 2p per litre on fuel to cancel out the VAT reduction.  VAT will return to 17.5% and the extra 2p will remain so it has been introduced as another stealth tax on the innocent motorist.
